notes: Modern, clean apartment on the 14th floor with light wood laminate flooring, floor-to-ceiling windows providing excellent natural light, open kitchen with breakfast bar, AC, and a separate bedroom. Baby safety concerns include the balcony with sliding glass doors on a high floor (14F), an open metal ladder/shelving unit with climbable rungs, and tall bar stools that could tip; the space is otherwise clean with no sharp corners. The listing description is minimal (agent boilerplate only), which is a minor red flag â€” worth confirming actual layout and amenities in person.
